page.title: 02Chapel St.Leonards Tourism
page.content: In Chapel St.Leonards tourism is very popular with caravan sites and camping sites because of the lovely beach and the chalets along the top of the beach .We have caravans behind the Village Hall and there is usually a camping exhibition. The biggest site is the Robin Hood Camp which is just out of Chapel St.Leonards.Most people spend the days on the beach.If they have children they have rides on the donkeys.Most people have a car or came on a coach for a week.there's Millers Amusement Centre in the Village with many shops,food shops and toy shops.
